tool_description: This API will provide you information about future matches of different clubs in Premier League
name: Premier League Upcoming Matches
title: Premier League Upcoming Matches

api_list.name: /fixtures
api_list.description: When making a request to this API, it will return a JSON containing a list of upcoming matches in Premier League

api_list.name: /competitions
api_list.description: This API will return an array of **5 biggest competitions** in which all clubs in* Premier League* are able to participate

api_list.name: /clubs
api_list.description: This API will supply client info about all clubs that are playing the First Premier League Competition
